question: Read two rakath namaz and then read the dua for istekhara. On two places in the dua think about your problem. After that go to bed and sleep on a clean bedsheet facing the kabah. is this ok?
answer:
QUESTION
Read two rakath namaz and then read the dua for istekhara. On two places in the dua think about your problem. After that go to bed and sleep on a clean bedsheet facing the kabah. After that when you wake up in the morning think wheter to do the thing you want to or not. Continue with this method for one week. After one week you should be having a strong feeling of wheter to do the thing or not. He has not given mention of dream just like you have said it is wrong. But this method is slightly different from yours as you say it can be done any time. All i want to know is wheter this method is correct or not. This book is very famous in india.
ANSWER


Share:
The method of Istikhaara mentioned in the book, Bahishti Zewar, is correct.

Moulana Ashraf Ali Thanwi (RA) was considered a great scholar of Deen in his era. The book is authentic and the contents therein are correct.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
